effect.black-white: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.black-2-white-2: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

short_effect.black-white: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

flavor_text.black-white: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. It also hurts the user slightly.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. It also hurts the user slightly.
